long_description: Add the Piggyback Rider Mud Flap to your NOMIS Stand Up child carrier (sold separately) to protect your lower back from water, mud and grime on your little passenger's shoes. Nylon and HDPE material offers a reliable barrier between your child's dirty shoes and your back. The Piggyback Rider Mud Flap attaches easily to your NOMIS Stand Up child carrier's foot-bar straps.
short_description: Add the Piggyback Rider Mud Flap to your NOMIS Stand Up child carrier (sold separately) to protect your lower back from water, mud and grime on your little passenger's shoes.
